Desc.entry: Provides grants to community groups and organisations for assisting with running costs, capital costs and training costs if no other funding is available. Only community groups and organisations within the following boundary can apply: Vulcan Road, Carbrook Street, Cardiff Street, Hill Top, Worthing Road, Lumley Street, Ripon Street, Broad Oaks, Green Wood Crescent, Halsall Avenue, Poole Road, Olivers Drive, Senior Road, Greenland Road and Shepcote Lane. Applications to be made by 1st June and 1st December each year. Maximum grant is Â£375 in any twelve month period (occasional exceptional grants are made if funds are available). The trust will not fund improvements to property. No referral necessary.
